The sub/guild itself is still alive.

Why were they banned?

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:
there is no whisper network mate, he admitted to using two accounts on his voat thread.

and the admin already responded to this https://ruqqus.com/post/10zr/they-banned-the-guildmaster/39qg

stop bothering the devs and wait for an official statement.

EDIT: i heard there planning on making one

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

body:
They have to do that. Ruqqus could find themselves in legal trouble if they don't ban inciting violence, or don't enforce their TOS.

I wouldn't take his rudeness personally either, he did it to me too for asking about their faulty ways of running the Discord server and a few other things. For some reason he's been acting miffed for the past couple weeks, I hope he's doing okay.
body_html:
They have to do that. Ruqqus could find themselves in legal trouble if they don't ban inciting violence, or don't enforce their TOS.

I wouldn't take his rudeness personally either, he did it to me too for asking about their faulty ways of running the Discord server and a few other things. For some reason he's been acting miffed for the past couple weeks, I hope he's doing okay.
